caption: This is a Latin salsa dance music piece. There are male vocals singing loudly in the Spanish language. There is a groovy bass line. The rhythmic background is provided by the cowbell strokes. The atmosphere is lively. This piece could be used as an accompaniment piece for a Latin dance course.
